definition: character used in Taiwan as a substitute for a real name (like "X" in English)/variant of 〇[ling2]
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
twenty (20), in a limited number of set expressions/also written using banker's character 念
Bye bye! (in chat room and text messages)
numeral 9 in Suzhou numeral system 蘇州碼子|苏州码子[Su1 zhou1 ma3 zi5]
"long stride" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 54), occurring in 建, 延, 廷 etc
numeral 7 in Suzhou numeral system 蘇州碼子|苏州码子[Su1 zhou1 ma3 zi5]
iteration mark (used to represent a duplicated character)
numeral 6 in Suzhou numeral system 蘇州碼子|苏州码子[Su1 zhou1 ma3 zi5]
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
